channel.title: *rename*DevotionX*rename*
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2nrhx7q.png[/img]
Base - Emolous
[I]Plans[/I] Carpe Diem Will be an all Around server, with Awesome Player Killing. Money will be Gained from Skills, Killing Non Player Characters, Staking, and player killing. Carpe Diem will have Quest and a Medium-Low experience rate.
Development Team
Server Programmers
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/nn4b9l.png[/img]Michael - (me) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/nn4b9l.png[/img]Empty[/COLOR]
Client Programmers
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/a4nat4.png[/img]Empty [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/a4nat4.png[/img]Empty
Forum Programmers
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14keesn.png[/img]Empty [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14keesn.png[/img]Empty
Hoster
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/efhvnc.png[/img] Empty [/CENTER]
Want to Apply?
Then Follow this Format!
[CODE] Real Life Name: Age: MSN: Position: Experience(If Hoster Selected Skip this): Proof(If Hoster, Show Screen shot of Computer/VPS specs): Why should you be picked?:[/CODE]
[CENTER]--Media--
-_Client Background_- [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/r7uaee.jpg[/img]
Music Tab Server Info [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2zdrqjk.jpg[/img]
Wizard Class [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/k2og2d.gif[/img]
Archer Class [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2zz3g21.gif[/img]
Warrior Class [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jiyjo7.gif[/img]
Items Kept on Death [IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/6961/itemskeptondeath.gif[/img]
Beginner Map Orb [IMG]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8307/beginmapv.gif[/img]
--Features--
[ul][*]Full Dueling [*]Shopping System [*]Custom Classes [*]Nearly Perfect Combat [*]Correct GFX's for Mage + Range [*]Barrows [*]Trading [*]Banning Systems [*]Correct Runescape Teleports [*]Music Tab Server Info [*]Items Kept on Death Custom Interface [*]Changed Whip Special Attack to Old Rs's Style (Hits either a 0 or your Max hit) [*]Added Beginners Map Orb(Shows Map of South East Runescape! [*] More Coming Later[/ul] [/CENTER]

@glestrts wrote:

King_Zuber:

Nice project, i also like how you are using Emulous as your base

agreed, emulous is a epic source, i finally convinced my friend to switch to it from dynasty.

O.T. you fix magic massing yet?

item.title: *rename*DevotionX*rename*

item.description:
@King_Zuber wrote:

Nice project, i also like how you are using Emulous as your base, no offence to other Devolution/DeltaScape users, but there are to many Delta server developments but they aren’t going no where.
